competition_summary.context: Competition Market Factors Our ability to enter into additional long-term SPAs to underpin the development of additional Trains or develop new projects is subject to market factors.  These factors include changes in worldwide supply and demand for natural gas, LNG and substitute products, the relative prices for natural gas, crude oil and substitute products in North America and international markets, the extent of energy security needs in the European Union and elsewhere, the rate of fuel switc
